content:
The Roost Laptop Stand is a fantastic option for those who need a durable and adjustable stand. Here are some details to help you decide:

**Weight and Portability:**
The Roost Laptop Stand weighs only 1.3 pounds (590 grams), making it incredibly lightweight and portable. It's easy to toss into your backpack or bag, and it won't add much bulk to your luggage.

**Adjustability:**
The Roost Stand is highly adjustable, allowing you to customize the height and angle of your laptop to fit your ergonomic needs. You can adjust the stand to six different heights, ranging from 2.5 to 10.5 inches (6.4 to 26.7 cm) above your desk. The stand also tilts up to 30 degrees, so you can find the perfect angle for your screen.

**Setup and Assembly:**
Setting up the Roost Stand is a breeze. It requires no tools or assembly, and you can have it up and running in about 30 seconds. The stand has a simple, intuitive design that makes it easy to adjust and use.

**Durability:**
The Roost Stand is built to last, with a sturdy aluminum construction that can support laptops up to 17 inches in size and 4.5 pounds (2 kg) in weight. The stand's feet are also rubberized, which helps prevent slipping and scratching on your desk.

**Other Features:**

* The Roost Stand has a sleek, compact design that takes up minimal desk space when not in use.
* It's compatible with most laptops, including MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, and PC laptops.
* The stand has a built-in cable management system to keep your cords organized and out of the way.
* Roost offers a 1-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee.

**User Reviews:**
The Roost Laptop Stand has an average rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars on Amazon, with many users praising its durability, adjustability, and portability. Some users have mentioned that the stand can be a bit wobbly at the highest height settings, but this is a minor issue for most users.

Overall, the Roost Laptop Stand is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a durable, adjustable, and portable stand. Its lightweight design, ease of use, and sturdy construction make it an ideal option for remote workers, travelers, and anyone who wants to improve their laptop-using experience.
